attributes.additional_details: School uniform is often very itchy and uncomfortable and when you wear your own clothes, you always feel more focused, and ready to start the day. I have also found that it makes me a lot happier to be wearing my own clothes.
attributes.background: In every school in the UK children will be allowed to wear their own clothes at school. This means that school uniform will be abolished.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban school uniforms in English schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
